title: Father Charged After Son, 6, Fatally Shoots 3-Year-Old Brother
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Chicago - Today 
A Chicago man is in jail after his 6-year-old son fatally shot his 3-year-old brother with a gun left in the kitchen. Michael Santiago, 25,...
